item.title: TikTokがRedboxのオーナーと契約を結び、RedboxのキオスクでTikTokのビデオを上映する。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
TikTok signs a deal with the owner of Redbox to show TikTok videos at Redbox kiosks; brands will be able to advertise alongside via ad platform Crackle Connex  —  The video app will provide content from its platform, while Crackle Connex will handle ad deals.  —  TikTok is coming to a Redbox DVD kiosk near you.

item.title: 英放送局チャンネル4、2022年度の売上高は前年比2％減の11億4,000万ポンド、税引前利益は2,000万ポンドの黒字、広告収入以外の売上は全体の11％を占める（K.J.Yossman/Variety)
item.description:
K.J. Yossman / Variety:
UK broadcaster Channel 4 reports 2022 revenue down 2% YoY to £1.14B and a £20M pre-tax surplus; non-advertising revenue made up 11% of total revenue  —  U.K. broadcaster Channel 4 has posted robust revenues of £1.14 billion ($1.47 billion) for 2022.

item.title: BookTokとBookstagramが書籍宣伝のためのグッズ利用を増加させ、インフルエンサーが読書を美学に変えていると批判されるに至った経緯（Madeline Diamond/Esquire）
item.description:
Madeline Diamond / Esquire:
How BookTok and Bookstagram caused a rise in merchandise use for book publicity, leading to influencers being criticized for turning reading into an aesthetic  —  BookTok and Bookstagram have given rise to a new form of book publicity.  Is it tearing the literary community apart?

item.title: ウクライナ侵攻後のロシアにおけるウィキペディア（ウィキペディアの人気は衰えず、クレムリンに準拠した新興のウィキペディア「Ruwiki」は、長年の編集者が率いている）（Noam Cohen/Bloomberg
item.description:
Noam Cohen / Bloomberg:
A look at Wikipedia in Russia after the Ukraine invasion, where the service remains popular, and Kremlin-compliant upstart Ruwiki, led by a long-service editor  —  When a group of armed mercenaries seized a Russian regional capital and began marching toward Moscow in late June, verified information was hard to come by.

item.title: 情報筋DisneyはStar India事業の戦略的選択肢を模索中、Media Partners AsiaはDisney+ Hotstarは2023年度に1500万加入者を失うと試算（Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Disney is exploring strategic options for its Star India business; Media Partners Asia estimates Disney+ Hotstar could lose 15M subscribers in FY 2023  —  Talks are a sign of how Star India's fortunes have changed since Disney's purchase of Fox entertainment assets

item.title: テキサスA&M大学、ジャーナリズム・プログラム復活のためテキサス大学教授へのオファーを弱める。
item.description:
Kate McGee / The Texas Tribune:
Texas A&M weakened its offer to a University of Texas professor to revive its journalism program, after backlash about DEI and her NYT past; she's staying at UT  —  The university celebrated its decision to hire Kathleen McElroy to revive its journalism program.

item.title: Twitterのコミュニティ・ノートのボランティア投稿者は、サイト上で横行するスパムや偽情報のチェックについて詳述し、このツールは十分とは言い難いと述べている（Nitish Pahwa/Slate）
item.description:
Nitish Pahwa / Slate:
A volunteer contributor for Twitter's Community Notes details checking rampant spam and disinformation across the site and says the tool is far from sufficient  —  Twitter's “Community Notes” volunteers are supposed to make the platform “the most accurate source of information about the world.”
